demographics.technical_proficiency: Moderate (prefers using the website on a computer but finds the app easier)

background_context.situation: Active member of a community organization
background_context.environment: Uses the website primarily on a computer at home

goals_motivations.drives: Wants to easily access signed up events and upcoming events
goals_motivations.achievements: Seeks a more streamlined experience on the website

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Visits the website to review signed up events and check for upcoming events
behaviors_patterns.habits: Uses the website at home; finds the Apricot app easier to navigate

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Website is cumbersome and not intuitive for navigation
pain_points_frustrations.does_not_work_well: Difficulty in finding personalized content after logging in

needs_desires.life_better: A more user-friendly website that directs them to personalized content easily
needs_desires.looking_for: Clear guidance on valuable events and content

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Expects a seamless online experience; values community engagement
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers straightforward navigation and clear instructions

technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Moderately comfortable with technology; prefers desktop use
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Benefits from guided instructions and clear information

quotes: I find the website a little cumbersome.
I would love to be able to go on and once you log in, then it sends you right to your page where these are the things you've signed up for and upcoming events for you.
